content:
Was the Rustc internal documentation moved? The usual link: https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/nightly-rustc/rustc_middle/ just ends up on a 404 page.

I'm not sure if this is a compiler, documentation or infra problem. But I guess infra, since I couldn't find any Rust PRs that would have resulted in changing the place where the internal documentation is hosted. There also aren't any PRs that update the link in the rustc-dev-guide or on rust-forge.
